price: 26 Certains diront : « Nous vivions sur terre au milieu des nôtres dans la crainte de notre Seigneur.
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبۡلُ فِيٓ أَهۡلِنَا مُشۡفِقِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: qālū innā kunnā qablu fī ahlinā mush'fiqīna
